data.description: Examine musical improvisation from performers and select repertoire primarily from the Jazz Canon. Explore harmonic, melodic, rhythmic, and cultural expansion into the 20th and 21st centuries of improvisational performance practice. Learn elements needed to transform from a performer into a viable and competent improvisor. Emphasis on cross-cultural understanding and interdisciplinarity.
data.title: ADVANCED JAZZ IMPROVISATION

data.description: More advanced theoretical concepts, development of aural skills, and analysis procedures related to the jazz idiom.
data.title: JAZZ IMPROVISATION

data.description: Theoretical concepts, development of aural skills, and analysis procedures related to the jazz idiom. Audition required.
data.title: JAZZ IMPROVISATION
